title: Introduction to Svelte
content: Svelte is a new way to build user interfaces. It's a framework that shifts much of the work to compile time, creating highly optimized JavaScript code that updates the DOM efficiently.

title: Getting Started with SvelteKit
content: SvelteKit is a framework for building web applications using Svelte. It provides a lot of functionality out of the box, including routing, data loading, and static site generation.

title: Static Site Generation with SvelteKit
content: SvelteKit makes static site generation easy. By using the adapter-static package, you can build a fully static site that can be deployed to platforms like Netlify or Vercel.
